name: New York
timeDifference: 13 hours behind Seoul (UTC+9), 5 hours behind London (UTC+1), 1 hour ahead of Chicago (UTC-5)
businessHub: Wall Street, the financial capital of the world, home to the New York Stock Exchange and major banks.

topAttractionsForProfessionals.name: One World Observatory
topAttractionsForProfessionals.description: Located at the World Trade Center, offering panoramic views of Manhattan, perfect for impressing clients.

topAttractionsForProfessionals.name: Bryant Park
topAttractionsForProfessionals.description: A green oasis near Times Square, ideal for casual business meetings or a quick lunch break.

localLifestyle: New Yorkers live a fast-paced life, often grabbing coffee on the go and working late in bustling Manhattan.
localCulture: A melting pot of cultures, with a strong emphasis on diversity; punctuality is key in business settings.
signatureDish: New York-style Pizza - Thin, foldable slices with a crispy crust, best at Joe’s Pizza.

networkingEvents.name: New York Tech Summit
networkingEvents.description: A major tech conference with networking opportunities for professionals in innovation and startups.

businessTip: Dress code is formal in financial districts; schedule meetings in the morning to avoid rush hour.
